CONTACT_US_FOR_HELP.CALL_CHARGES: Find out about call charges (opens in a new window)
CONTACT_US_FOR_HELP.RESPONSE_DELAY: We'll get back to you within 10 days
CONTACT_US_FOR_HELP.TITLE: Contact us for help
CONTACT_US_FOR_HELP.WEB_CHAT_CLOSED: Web chat is now closed. Come back Monday to Friday 8.30am to 5pm or contact us by phone or email.
CONTACT_US_FOR_HELP.WEB_CHAT_UNAVAILABLE: The web chat service is temporarily unavailable, please try again later.

ADMISSION_PAYMENT_DATE.TITLE: What date will you pay on?

CHECK_YOUR_ANSWER.DEBTS_LOANS_OR_CREDIT_CARDS: Do you have loans or credit card debts?
CHECK_YOUR_ANSWER.OWE_MONEY: Do you owe the money claimed?
CHECK_YOUR_ANSWER.TITLE: Check your answers

CITIZEN_PHONE.INFORMATION: We'll give your phone number to the person, business, or organisation claiming from you, or to their legal representative, if they have one.
CITIZEN_PHONE.MORE_INFORMATION: We will only call you if we need more information about this claim.
CITIZEN_PHONE.TITLE: Enter a phone number (optional)

CLAIM_DETAILS.INTEREST_SNIPPET: Interest calculated at {{ rate }}% for {{ numberOfDays }} days ({{ interestDate }} to {{ interestToDate }})

DEFENDANT_TIMELINE.INCLUDE_DATES_IF_YOU_KNOW: Include dates if you know them.
DEFENDANT_TIMELINE.YOU_MIGHT_HAVE_SIGNED_A_CONTRACT: For example, you might have signed a contract
DEFENDANT_TIMELINE.ADD_ANY_COMMENTS: Add any comments about their timeline (optional)

DEPENDANTS.HOW_MANY: Enter how many for each age group.
DEPENDANTS.TITLE: Do any children live with you?

EXPERT_GUIDANCE.ASK_PERMISSION: You must ask for permission to use an expert - a judge will then decide whether the expert is necessary.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.COST_HIRING_EXPERT: The cost of hiring an expert depends on which expert you and the {{ otherParty }} choose.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.EXPERT_REPORT: The expert will provide a written report - they won’t usually come to court in person.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.FOR_EXAMPLE: For example, they might allow a structural engineer to be used in a claim about building works or a mechanic in a claim about car repairs.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.IF_JUDGE_ALLOWS: If a judge allows you to use an expert, you’ll usually have to share one expert with the {{ otherParty }}.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.IF_PERMISSION: If you get permission to use an expert
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.IF_YOU_WIN: If you win the case you may be able to recover a maximum of £750 of the cost you paid. A judge will rule on this at the end of the hearing.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.JUDGE_ALLOW_EXPERT: A judge will only allow you to use an expert if they believe they need the expert’s specialist knowledge.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.JUDGE_DECIDE_COST: The judge will also decide whether the cost of the expert is reasonable compared to the value of the claim.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.JUDGE_MAY_ASK: The judge may ask one of you to make a list of 3 independent experts who can provide a written report in return for a fee.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.JUDGES_RESPONSIBLE_COST: Even though you and the {{ otherParty }} share the cost of hiring the expert, judges are still responsible for keeping costs in proportion to value.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.MUST_AVOID_DISCUSSING: You must avoid discussing the case in detail with the 3 experts.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.OTHER_PARTY_CHOOSES: The other party then chooses one expert from the list. After that, you both need to follow these steps
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.PAY_EXPERT: Pay the expert - you usually both share this cost.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.PROVIDE_EXTRA: Provide any extra information the expert asks for.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.PROVIDE_QUESTIONS: Provide questions for the expert to answer in a report.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.RARE: It’s rare for judges to allow you to use an expert in a small claim.
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.SEND_EXPERT_REPORT: Send the expert’s report to the court (only one of you will have to do this).
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.TITLE: Using an expert in small claims
EXPERT_GUIDANCE.USUALLY_SHARE_COST: Usually you both share this cost.

EXPLANATION.TITLE: Briefly explain why you can’t pay immediately

PAYMENT_OPTION.REQUEST: The claimant can request a County Court Judgment (CCJ) against you if you don't pay immediately.
PAYMENT_OPTION.TITLE: When do you want to pay?
PAYMENT_OPTION.YOU_MUST_CONTACT: You must contact the claimant and pay the full amount within 5 days. Any cheques or transfers must be clear in their account.

INCOMPLETE_SUBMISSION.TITLE: You need to complete all sections before you submit your response

MEDIATION_DISAGREEMENT.MANY_ADVANTAGES_TO_FREE_MEDIATION: There are many advantages to free mediation, including:

REJECT_ALL.FEE_BASED: The fee is based on the amount you`re claiming, including interest.

RESIDENCE.OWN_HOME: Home you own yourself (or pay a mortgage on)
RESIDENCE.TITLE: Where do you live?

TASK_LIST.ALL_ACTIONS_COMPLETED_CHECK_ANSWERS: After you have completed all the actions you will be taken to a page where you can check your answers before submitting.

YOU_HAVE_PAID_LESS.HEADER: You've paid less than the total claim amount
YOU_HAVE_PAID_LESS.EXPLAIN_WHY_YOU_DONT_OWE_REMAINING_AMOUN: You need to explain why you believe you don't owe the remaining amount.
YOU_HAVE_PAID_LESS.IF_CLAIMANT_REJECTS: If CLAIMANT_NAME rejects your explanation you might have to go to a hearing.

YOUR_DEFENCE.BRIEFLY: Briefly explain why you disagree with the claim
YOUR_DEFENCE.FAIL: If you fail to dispute any part of the claim the court may assume you admit it.
YOUR_DEFENCE.ACCEPT: You should also say if you accept any parts of the claim.
YOUR_DEFENCE.TIMELINE: Don’t give us a detailed timeline - we’ll ask for that separately.
YOUR_DEFENCE.TITLE: Why do you disagree with the claim?
YOUR_DEFENCE.REASON: Their reasons for making the claim
YOUR_DEFENCE.CLAIMANT: Your response will be sent to {{ claimantFullName }}.

ERRORS.AMOUNT_INVALID_DECIMALS: Enter a valid amount, maximum two decimal places
ERRORS.AMOUNT_LESS_THAN_CLAIMED: Enter a value less than the amount claimed
ERRORS.AMOUNT_REQUIRED: Enter an amount of £1 or more
ERRORS.ANNUAL_TURNOVER_REQUIRED: Are you sure this is a valid value?
ERRORS.DEFENCE_REQUIRED: You need to explain why you don’t owe the money
ERRORS.DEFENDANT_POSTCODE_NOT_VALID: Postcode must be in England or Wales
ERRORS.DESCRIPTION_REQUIRED: Enter a description of what happened
ERRORS.DIRECTION_QUESTIONNAIRE_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: Tell us if you believe the hearing requirement details on this page are true
ERRORS.ENTER_AN_EXPLANATION: Enter an explanation of why you can’t pay now
ERRORS.ENTER_PAYMENT_EXPLANATION: Enter text explaining how you paid
ERRORS.EQUAL_INSTALMENTS_REQUIRED: Enter a valid amount for equal instalments
ERRORS.FIRST_PAYMENT_DATE_IN_THE_FUTURE_REQUIRE: Enter a first payment date in the future
ERRORS.SIGNER_NAME_REQUIRED: Enter the name of the person signing the statement
ERRORS.SIGNER_ROLE_REQUIRED: Enter the role of the person signing the statement
ERRORS.STATEMENT_OF_TRUTH_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: Tell us if you believe the facts stated in this response are true
ERRORS.TEXT_TOO_LONG: Reason must be 500 characters or fewer
ERRORS.TEXT400_TOO_LONG: Reason must be 400 characters or fewer
ERRORS.VALID_AMOUNT_ONE_POUND_OR_MORE: Enter an amount of £1 or more
ERRORS.VALID_AT_LEAST_ONE_OPTION: You must select at least one option
ERRORS.VALID_DATE_NOT_IN_PAST: Enter a date that is today or in the future
ERRORS.VALID_DISAGREE_REASON_REQUIRED: Enter text explaining why do you disagree
ERRORS.VALID_ENTER_AT_LEAST_ONE_COURT_ORDER: Enter at least one court order
ERRORS.VALID_ENTER_AT_LEAST_ONE_NUMBER: Enter a number for at least one field
ERRORS.VALID_FREE_TEXT_DATE_LENGTH: Enter a date no longer than $constraint1 characters
ERRORS.VALID_NUMBER_FOR_PREVIOUS_PAGE: Number can’t be higher than on previous page
ERRORS.VALID_PHONE_NUMBER: Enter a phone number in the correct format
ERRORS.VALID_TWO_DECIMAL_NUMBER: Enter a valid amount, maximum two decimal places
ERRORS.VALID_VALUE: Are you sure this is a valid value?
